channel.title: Apt on wjzhou Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Apt on wjzhou Personal Blog

item.title: Apt Key Add Keysig
item.description: For some reason, recently, the Key used by ros is expiring frequently. E.g. when an warning like this when apt update: W: An error occurred during the signature verification. The repository is not updated and the previous index files will be used. GPG error: http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu bionic InRelease: The following signatures were invalid: EXPKEYSIG F42ED6FBAB17C654 Open Robotics <info@osrfoundation.org> W: Failed to fetch http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu/dists/bionic/InRelease The following signatures were invalid: EXPKEYSIG F42ED6FBAB17C654 Open Robotics <info@osrfoundation.
